title: 2nd Annual Socktober
description:
_October 1st - October 28th_

Goal: Collect a trunk full of NEW socks to donate to a local homeless shelter for the upcoming winter months.

Who: Everyone! Invite your friends and family to help us support locals in need. 

What: New socks for men, women, and children. 

When: All during October. It will conclude with Trunk or Treat at Eagle Valley Church of Christ on October 28, 2018.

Where: Please place donations in the marked bin in the foyer. 

Why: ["Even the smallest acts of love, like donating a pair of socks, can make a big difference in the lives of our neighbors who are homeless."](http://soulpancake.com/socktober/)
